name: lightreader
description: 轻量级在线EPUB电子书阅读器

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r index.html favicon.ico manifest.json robots.txt sitemap.xml img dist/
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o dist/css/styles.min.css css/styles.css && cp dist/css/styles.min.css dist/css/styles.css
scripts.minify-js: uglifyjs js/epub-reader.js -o dist/js/epub-reader.min.js && cp dist/js/epub-reader.min.js dist/js/epub-reader.js

author: Yvonne
